description: Retrieves a direct assignment of a user or group to an application. If the user doesn't have a direct assignment to the application, the user may still have access to the application through a group. Therefore, don't use this API to test access to an application for a user. Instead use  ListApplicationAssignmentsForPrincipal.

parameters.name: ApplicationArn
parameters.description: Specifies the ARN of the application. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) and Amazon Web Services Service Namespaces in the Amazon Web Services General Reference.

parameters.name: PrincipalId
parameters.description: An identifier for an object in IAM Identity Center, such as a user or group. PrincipalIds are GUIDs (For example, f81d4fae-7dec-11d0-a765-00a0c91e6bf6). For more information about PrincipalIds in IAM Identity Center, see the IAM Identity Center Identity Store API Reference.

parameters.name: PrincipalType
parameters.description: The entity type for which the assignment will be created.

nested_items.name: PrincipalType
nested_items.description: The entity type for which the assignment will be created.

For more information about PrincipalIds in IAM Identity Center, see the IAM Identity Center Identity Store API Reference.
